verses.roman:
advaita-mahimā ananta ke pāre kahite
sei likhi, yei śuni mahājana haite

synonyms: advaita-mahimā—the glories of Advaita Ācārya; ananta—unlimited; ke—who; pāre—is able; kahite—to say; sei—that; likhi—I write; yei—whatever; śuni—I hear; mahājana haite—from authority.
translation: Who can describe the unlimited glories of Advaita Ācārya? I write here as much as I have known from great authorities.
